sample_error_pairs.ground_truth: Hello, this is Priya from Elevate now. Am I speaking with Munira Mandviwala?

sample_error_pairs.reference: The Nano Plan costs Rupees one thousand seven hundred ninety-nine, which includes the blood test, doctor consultation, and health coach session. Compared to individual market prices, which total around Rupees six thousand, our plan offers significant savings. Would you like to know about the payment options?
sample_error_pairs.ground_truth: I'll send you the payment links on your registered mobile number. If you have any questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Goodbye and have a great day.

sample_error_pairs.reference: You have two payment options: you can either make a partial payment of Rupees four hundred ninety-nine now and pay the remaining Rupees one thousand three hundred ninety-nine at the time of blood sample collection, totaling to Rupees one thousand eight hundred ninety-eight. Or, you can pay the full amount of Rupees one thousand seven hundred ninety-nine upfront. I'll send both payment links to your registered mobile number via WhatsApp. Do you have any more questions?
